       throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException,
              java.io.IOException,
              java.awt.FontFormatException
        Attack constructor
        Parameters:
        character - Skill owner
        id - Skill ID
        name - Skill Name
        info - Skill description
        imgName - Skill icon file
        damage - Damage dealt on target
        reqs - List with requirements needed to use skill
        useWeapon - True if equipped weapon damage should be counted to attack damage, false otherwise
        castTime - Cast time
        cooldown - Time that must be waited after skill use
        range - Required range
        gc - Slick game container
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        java.io.IOException
        java.awt.FontFormatException
